title: Ex-Tesla Employee Called Racial Slur Wins Rare Award
itunes:title: Ex-Tesla Employee Called Racial Slur Wins Rare Award
description:
Employment law expert Anthony Oncidi, a partner at Proskauer Rose, discusses Tesla paying more than $1 million to a Black former employee who won a ruling that the company failed to stop his supervisors from calling him a racial slur at the electric-car maker’s northern California plant.

Madison Alder, Bloomberg Law Reporter, discusses Congress weighing the first district court expansion since then-Sen. Joe Biden spearheaded the last change decades ago.

June Grasso hosts.
